content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the following two images.

Image1

Francisco José de Goya y Lucientes, Spanish painter, Rightly or Wrongly (1810), etching showing Spanish civilians ﬁghting against Napoleon’s soldiers during the Peninsular War

Image 2

Anonymous German engraving (1817), showing members of a German student society burning monarchist books and symbols at a commemoration of the four-year anniversary of Napoleon’s defeat at the Battle of Leipzig
content.question: A historian would be most likely to use the two images as evidence that the Napoleonic Wars

choices.label: affected civilians in Germany less severely than they did civilians in Spain
inspired nationalist sentiment in both Germany and Spain
brought about resistance to French rule in Spain but not in Germany
led artists in both Spain and Germany to experiment with new styles and subject matter

content.answer: inspired nationalist sentiment in both Germany and Spain

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century
